text: The Sindhi Bhil or Bheel (Sindhi: سنڌي ڀيل) are a Sindhi sub-group of the Bhil people of the Indian subcontinent. They speak Bhili dialect of Sindhi language. They live in the regions such as Sindh, South Punjab, and Balocistan, provinces of Pakistan. They are one of the major Hindu community in the region, though some are Muslims as well. == References == Category:People from Sindh
title: Sindhi Bhils
